snippet: Russia must understand Ukrainians’ wish for stronger ties with the European Union and the West.
abstract: Editorial calls on Russia, along with embattled Ukrainian Pres Viktor Yanukovich, to accept public outcry in Ukraine for greater ties with Europe; holds European Union and other Western nations must find a way to forge an association agreement with Ukraine that is less threatening to Russia.
lead_paragraph: Russia must understand Ukrainians’ wish for stronger ties with the European Union and the West.

headline.main: A Moment of Peril in Kiev
headline.print_headline: A Moment of Peril in Kiev
